greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = maximum absolute value of coefficients in the cyclotomic polynomial C(N,x), where N = n-th number which a product of three distinct odd primes = A046389(n).
reference: _Don Reble_, Posting to Sequence Fans Mailing List, Nov 26 2016
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
maple: b:= proc(n) option remember; local k;
for k from 2+`if`(n=1, 1, b(n-1)) by 2 while
bigomega(k)<>3 or nops(factorset(k))<>3 do od; k
mathematica: b[n_] := b[n] = (For[k = 2 + If[n == 1, 1, b[n-1]], PrimeOmega[k] != 3 || PrimeNu[k] != 3, k += 2]; k);
a[n_] :=  Max @ Abs @ CoefficientList[Cyclotomic[b[n], x], x];
Array[a, 120] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 28 2017, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
xref: Cf. A046389. See A278567 for a closely related sequence.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 27 2016
